resources.string: This is a 15 Day Trial Period. By accepting this trial period, you understand, accept and agree to the End User License Agreement. This trial period cannot be extended in any way; should you want to continue to use this software after the trial period, a license key and a software maintenance agreement must be purchased. To obtain this, please contact your service provider.
To obtain a key, please contact your service provider.
No security badge/barcode input received. Restarting workflow.

When Dashboard Access is turned on, your device can scan either QR codes or IdCards by external hardware devices plugged into the kiosk.\n\nTo improve user experience will be shown dashboard screen with the bunch of customizations available for that feature.
